documents.document: we stayed in an apartment belonging to them We arrived there late at night it was the 1st hotel we visited, the man offered us an apartment for the night at an excellent rate, we were only planning on staying there for the 1st night as we have other accom. booked however we change our mind and stayed the week our apartment had a balcony which over looked the main plaza had a kitchen/living/dinning room in the one space and a room with 2singlebeds and 1double it was great, extremely clean,maybe a little basic for some people but my friends and I found it ecellent
